p: Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) was declared a global pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) on March 11, 2020. Despite an overall 2% mortality rate in COVID-19 patients, 53.8–61.5% of critically ill patients deceased within 28 days of admission to intensive care units (ICU) [ 1– 3]. Thus, there is an urgent medical need for the overall assessment of patients’ condition and early intervention for these high-fatality cases.
